INT-000001.message: Hi, I'm Tippy! I'm your new friend and assistant. I will help you get better at FFXIV!

INT-000002.message: Do you know that I now have configuration options?

INT-000003.message: Ready for a new tip? You can right click on me to request another one!

INT-000004.message: Bored of a tip? You can right click on me to hide it forever!

INT-000005.message: Other plugins can now send me messages! Ask your favorite plugin developer to integrate with Tippy!

GEN-000001.message: Vuln stacks really don't affect damage you receive by that much, so ignore any healer that complains about you not doing mechanics correctly.

GEN-000002.message: Wiping the party is an excellent method to clear away bad status effects, including death.

GEN-000003.message: Players in your party do not pay your sub. Play the game however you like and report harassment.

GEN-000004.message: In a big pull, always use the ability with the highest potency number on your bar.

GEN-000005.message: Make sure to avoid the stack marker so that your healers have less people to heal during raids!

GEN-000006.message: Put macro'd dialogue on all of your attacks as a tank to also gain enmity from your party members.

GEN-000007.message: Make sure to save your LB until the boss is at 1 pct. This will lead to the greatest effect.

GEN-000008.message: If you want to leave your party quickly and blame disconnect, just change your PC time!

GEN-000012.message: When playing Hunter, specialize your pet into taunting to help out your tank!

GEN-000013.message: It doesn't matter if you play BRD or MCH, it comes down to personal choice!

GEN-000014.message: This text is powered by duck energy!

GEN-000015.message: Goat is my original developer, so you can blame him for this.

GEN-000016.message: Did you know you can get through queue faster by hitting cancel?

GEN-000017.message: You do more damage if you're wearing casual attire.

GEN-000018.message: Don't worry about damage downs, it just shows you are focusing on the boss.

GEN-000019.message: I've seen you ERPing... Extreme Raid Progression can be fun.

GEN-000020.message: It seems like you are parsing grey. You should check out the official job guide to play better.

GEN-000021.message: Why doesn't Cid ever use steel? Because iron works.

GEN-000022.message: Why do FFXIV players always have broken down cars? They don't know any mechanics.

GEN-000023.message: What do moogles use when they go shopping? Kupons.

GEN-000024.message: What's Twintania's favorite party game? Twister.

GEN-000025.message: Why did the Sahagin cross the waves? To get to the other tide.

GEN-000026.message: What do you call a poor Lala? A little short.

GEN-000027.message: What do people do when they are cold? They Shiva.

GEN-000028.message: Don't like people? Try the visibility plugin today!

TANK-000001.message: Always save your cooldowns for boss fights.

TANK-000002.message: Piety matters as much as tenacity.

TANK-000003.message: Meld piety to maximize your DPS.

TANK-000004.message: Let your party know... you pull you tank!

HEAL-000001.message: Remember, Rescue works over gaps in the floor. Use it to save fellow players.

HEAL-000002.message: Remember, you're a healer not a dps. Doing damage is optional.

HEAL-000003.message: What type of shoes do healers wear? Heals.

DPS-000001.message: If you're feeling lazy, just let your party pick up the slack. They won't mind.

DOHL-000001.message: Stop crafting and gathering. Just buy my stuff off the market board instead.

GLA-000001.message: You can stay as a gladiator forever, just don't equip your job stone!

PGL-000001.message: You can stay as a pugilist forever, just don't equip your job stone!

MRD-000001.message: You can stay as a marauder forever, just don't equip your job stone!

LNC-000001.message: You can stay as a lancer forever, just don't equip your job stone!

ARC-000001.message: You can stay as a archer forever, just don't equip your job stone!

CNJ-000001.message: You can stay as a conjurer forever, just don't equip your job stone!

THM-000001.message: You can stay as a thaumaturge forever, just don't equip your job stone!

PLD-000001.message: Always use clemency whenever you have the mana.

PLD-000002.message: Why did the Paladin get kicked from the party? He wouldn't stop flashing everyone.

PLD-000003.message: Why do Paladins make bad secret agents? Because they always blow their Cover when things get dicey.

MNK-000001.message: Always use Six-Sided Star on CD. It's your highest potency ability.

MNK-000002.message: Use Fists of Fire Earth to mitigate big damage during fights. Your healers will thank you.

MNK-000003.message: Why are Monk jokes so funny? They have a strong punchline.

WAR-000001.message: Infuriate before Inner Release to guarantee a Direct Hit Critical Inner Chaos.

WAR-000002.message: Apply Nascent Flash to yourself to gain Nascent Glint for 10% damage  mitigation.

DRG-000001.message: Always make sure to use Mirage Dive directly after Jump so you don't forget to use it.

BRD-000001.message: Use macros so you can add song lyrics to your music!

WHM-000001.message: Always use Benediction on cooldown to maximize healing power!

WHM-000002.message: Fluid Aura is a DPS gain!

WHM-000003.message: Always use Cure immediately so you can get Freecure procs!

WHM-000004.message: Cure 1 is more mana-efficient than Cure 2, so use that instead of Glare!

BLM-000001.message: Tired of casting fire so much? Try out using only ice spells for a change of pace!

ACN-000001.message: You can stay as a arcanist forever, just don't equip your job stone!

SMN-000001.message: Titan-Egi can maximize your DPS by shielding you from interrupting damage!

SMN-000002.message: Why do people dislike summoners? They ruin everything.

SCH-000001.message: Attach Eos to the BRD so they receive healing when at max range.

SCH-000002.message: Swiftcast Succor before raidwide for heals and shield mitigation, allowing you to weave in an oGCD!

SCH-000003.message: Why do Scholars make such good sales people? Because there's a Succor born every minute.

ROG-000001.message: You can stay as a rogue forever, just don't equip your job stone!

NIN-000001.message: A ninja always appears raiton time!

NIN-000002.message: Tiger Palm is your most important GCD for Brew and Chi generation. Make sure to cast it in favor of other energy-spending abilities!

NIN-000003.message: Why are ninjas never late? Because they arrive Raiton time.

AST-000001.message: What is an Astrologian's favorite sweater? A cardigan.

SAM-000001.message: Increase Midare damage by shouting "BANKAI" in chat. This can be accomplished through the use of macros.

SAM-000002.message: The best SAM rotation is freestyle. Just do what works for you.

BLU-000001.message: Did you know that Blue Mage is throwaway content?

GNB-000001.message: Much like doing a "brake check" on the road, you can do a "heal check" in-game! Just pop Superbolide!

DNC-000001.message: Only give Dance Partner to people after they used a dance emote.

SGE-000001.message: Remember to always cast Kardia on yourself, especially in dungeons.

Tippy_Message_Command.message: Send a message for Tippy to show (usually) right away.

Tippy_Tip_Command.message: Send a tip for Tippy to show later at random.

Tippy_MsgHelp_Command.message: You need to send the message after /tippysendmsg. Like /tippysendmsg I love you Tippy.

Tippy_TipHelp_Command.message: You need to send the tip after /tippysendtip. Like /tippysendtip I love you Tippy.

###Tippy_BlockedTips_Text.message: Click on a tip to unblock.
